articles.description: Razer has unveiled a new version a Pro version of its Hammerhead True Wireless earbuds. The Hammerhead True Wireless Pro has a redesigned charging case and silicone ear tips, unlike the original model. The new earbuds support advanced hybrid ANC and 60 ms Blu…
articles.content: Over a year has passed since Razer unveiled its first pair of TWS earbuds. In the meantime, the company released a Pokémon-themed model, which featured a Poké ball-shaped charging case. Now, Razer ha… [+1386 chars]
